org.jtrim2.image

Class JavaIIOMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jtrim2.image.ImageMetaData
      • org.jtrim2.image.JavaIIOMetaData

  • public class JavaIIOMetaData
extends ImageMetaData
    Defines the meta data of images retrieved using the ImageIO library of Java. Apart from the properties derived from ImageMetaData, this class adds one more property: IIOMetadata. The IIOMetadata is the object used by the ImageIO library of Java for describing the meta data information of an image.

    Thread safety

    Methods of this class can be safely accessed by multiple threads. The methods of the subclasses of this class must be safe to be accessed concurrently as well. JavaIIOMetaData are not completely immutable because IIOMetadata objects are not immutable. Note however, that the IIOMetadata property of JavaIIOMetaData must not be altered.

    Synchronization transparency

    The methods of this class are synchronization transparent and the subclasses of this class must be synchronization transparent as well.
    See Also:
    ImageResult

    • Constructor Detail

      • JavaIIOMetaData

        public JavaIIOMetaData(int width,
                       int height,
                       javax.imageio.metadata.IIOMetadata iioMetaData,
                       boolean complete)
        Initializes the JavaIIOMetaData with the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        width - the width in number of pixels of the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData. This argument must be greater than or equal to zero.
        height - the height in number of pixels of the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData. This argument must be greater than or equal to zero.
        iioMetaData - the IIOMetadata supplied by the ImageIO library of Java. This argument can be null if for some reason it is unavailable.
        complete - a boolean indicating if the image whose meta data is the newly created ImageMetaData is a complete or partial image. If this argument is true, the image is completely loaded. If false, the image is only partially available.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the width or height argument is illegal

    • Method Detail

      • getIioMetaData

        public final javax.imageio.metadata.IIOMetadata getIioMetaData()
        Returns the IIOMetadata as provided by the ImageIO library of Java. This is the same object as the one specified at construction time.
        Returns:
        the IIOMetadata as provided by the ImageIO library of Java. This method may return null if null was provided at construction time.
